Text:
Unfortunately YIFY's "Lady and the Tramp" is cut down to 16:9 (virtually unrecognizable). Aspect ratio should be 1.33:1 and CinemaScope 2.55:1. Lock at the comparisent (the link) and see that there's 30% missing:

http://s23.postimg.org/7b7my5fui/lilaay5.jpg

I would recommend you download neons version instead, wich has hte absolute correct aspect ratio of 1280x496 (correlating perfectly to 1.33:1 and CinemaScope 2.55:1).

http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/7021674/Lady_And_The_Tramp_1955_720p_BRRip_%5BRelease-Lounge_H264%5D

didn't have a problem with the aspect ratio... but it seems like some scenes are cut off. the audio continues, but the video freezes and fades to black. it's just a few scenes and it's just a second or two of video that cuts off, but it is a little jarring.
NOT Blueray!  TV Rip!  Watermark at 40:05
